entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
